    private static ReadOnlySpan<byte> HotReloadHash => "10affbd2d05b097a0f6c9bc660363098"u8;

    public static ITestClass TestClass(this IPythonEnvironment env)
    {
        if (instance is null)
        {
            instance = new TestClassInternal(env.Logger);
        }
        Debug.Assert(!env.IsDisposed());
        return instance;
    }

    public static void UpdateApplication(Type[]? updatedTypes)
    {
        instance?.ReloadModule();
    }

        {
            logger.LogDebug("Reloading module {ModuleName}", "test");

/// <summary>
/// Represents functions of the Python module <c>test</c>.
/// </summary>
public interface ITestClass : IReloadableModuleImport
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_bool_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_bool_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestBoolBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int8_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int8_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt8Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint8_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint8_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint8Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int16_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int16_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt16Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint16_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint16_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint16Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int32_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int32_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt32Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int64_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int64_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt64Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint32_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint32_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint32Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint64_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint64_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint64Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_float32_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_float32_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestFloat32Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_float64_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_float64_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestFloat64Buffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_vector_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_vector_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestVectorBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int8_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int8_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt82dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint8_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint8_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint82dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int16_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int16_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt162dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint16_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint16_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint162dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int32_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int32_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestInt322dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint32_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint32_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestUint322dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_int64_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_int64_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_uint64_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_uint64_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_float32_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_float32_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestFloat322dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_float64_2d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_float64_2d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestFloat642dBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_global_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_global_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestGlobalBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_bytes_as_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_bytes_as_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestBytesAsBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_bytearray_as_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_bytearray_as_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestBytearrayAsBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_non_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_non_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestNonBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_non_contiguous_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_non_contiguous_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestNonContiguousBuffer();

    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_transposed_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_transposed_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
    IPyBuffer TestTransposedBuffer();

    /// <summary>
    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_ndim_3d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_ndim_3d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>

    /// Invokes the Python function <c>test_ndim_4d_buffer</c>:
    /// <code><![CDATA[
    /// def test_ndim_4d_buffer() -> Buffer: ...
    /// ]]></code>
    /// </summary>
